subtitleNullable: Perform Text Classification in Kannada using this Dataset
descriptionNullable:
This data set contains ~6300 news article headlines which I had collected from Kannada news websites.

The data set has been cleaned and contains train and test set using which you can benchmark your classification models in Kannada

The scripts which were used to create the data set can be found [here](https://github.com/goru001/nlp-for-kannada/tree/master/datasets-preparation)
title: Kannada News Dataset
subtitle: Perform Text Classification in Kannada using this Dataset
description:
This data set contains ~6300 news article headlines which I had collected from Kannada news websites.

The data set has been cleaned and contains train and test set using which you can benchmark your classification models in Kannada

The scripts which were used to create the data set can be found [here](https://github.com/goru001/nlp-for-kannada/tree/master/datasets-preparation)
